_header: Jesu that is most of might
Note: For an earlier text see 1607; for other versions, see 524, 4742.
Subjects: visions, of the afterlife; Patrick, saint; saints’ lives
_description: ‘Owayne Miles’, a couplet version of St. Patrick’s Purgagory — 341 couplets

YaleBei365.First Lines:
Ihesu þat ys moste of mythAnd of wronge makyth
                    ryth…
YaleBei365.Last Lines:
…That ys lord of mythtys mosteffadyr and þe sunne and
                    þe holy goste
